page.title: 14NEWS ITEMS-GOOSTREY AREA 1
page.content:
N.W.Gas is to provide a gas supply to the village hopefully by March 1986.
The Public Transport Campaign Group warns that government plans to privatise bus services could result in the loss of buses to Goostrey.
Elizabeth Garner,daughter of author Alan Garner, has had a poem included in W.H.Smith's "Young Writers' Year Book". Two of her classmates at Goostrey School, Catherine Simmons and Gillian Thomas, had illustrations included.
Villagers at Goostrey are to hold a sponsored walk in aid of the St.Luke's Hospice fund.
This month sees the second inspection for Goostrey's garden competition.
